U

update(Company) - Method in interface dao.CompanyDAO
 
update(Coupon) - Method in interface dao.CouponDAO
 
update(Customer) - Method in interface dao.CustomerDAO
 
update(Company) - Method in class dao.db.CompanyDaoDb
user cannot update the id
update(Coupon) - Method in class dao.db.CouponDaoDb
user cannot update id
update(Customer) - Method in class dao.db.CustomerDaoDb
the update method can update only the name and the password.
updateCompany(Company) - Method in class facade.AdminFacade
can update only the email and the password .
updateCompany(Company, HttpServletRequest) - Method in class webServices.Admin_Rest_Facade
this rest method get(with put method) company bean from the front-end and update only the email an the password in the data base.
updateCoupon(Coupon) - Method in class facade.CompanyFacade
a company can only update the expiration date and the price of the coupon.
updateCoupon(Coupon, HttpServletRequest) - Method in class webServices.Company_Rest_Facade
this method get coupon bean from the user and update only the end date and the price .
updateCustomer(Customer) - Method in class facade.AdminFacade
this method can only update the customer password .
updateCustomer(Customer, HttpServletRequest) - Method in class webServices.Admin_Rest_Facade
this method get (using post) customer bean from the admin user update only the customer password in the date base
